desc: Welcome to “Stitches in the Window” Here you will find the Highest Quality Handmade Specialty items, from Amish Style Quilts, Personalized Christmas Stockings, The Famous & Popular “KEEKI” Bags, & many Handmade Kitchen & Dining Essentials, Custom LongArm Services for your Quilting Pleasure. Thank you for stopping by.

layout.text: For All of your Unique Gifts
❤️ Every Item is Handmade, Stitched in Front of my Large Picture Window ❤️
